windows.command: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (-Not (Test-Path .venv)) { py -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; if (Test-Path requirements.txt) { python -m pip install -r requirements.txt }; python -m pip install ipykernel notebook jupyter_client traitlets tornado nest-asyncio; python -m ipykernel install --user --name .venv --display-name 'Python (.venv)'"

osx.command: bash -lc "[ -d .venv ] || python -m venv .venv; source .venv/bin/activate; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; [ -f requirements.txt ] && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt || true; python -m pip install ipykernel notebook jupyter_client traitlets tornado nest-asyncio; python -m ipykernel install --user --name .venv --display-name 'Python (.venv)'"

linux.command: bash -lc "[ -d .venv ] || python -m venv .venv; source .venv/bin/activate; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; [ -f requirements.txt ] && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt || true; python -m pip install ipykernel notebook jupyter_client traitlets tornado nest-asyncio; python -m ipykernel install --user --name .venv --display-name 'Python (.venv)'"
